alert.note: Alert for Burlington; Camden (New Jersey) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly (New Jersey, Delaware, Southeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 10 at 2:57PM EDT until August 10 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Philadelphia - Mount Holly
info.description: The National Weather Service in Mount Holly NJ has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Camden County in southern New Jersey... Southwestern Burlington County in southern New Jersey... * Until 330 PM EDT. * At 256 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sicklerville, or 13 miles southeast of Gloucester City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to roofs, siding, trees, and power lines is possible. * Locations impacted include... Berlin, Chesilhurst, Atco, Sicklerville, Atsion, Williamstown and Pine Hill. This includes Atlantic City Expressway between mile markers 37 and 40. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
